original_text: And he removed that day the he goats that were ringstraked and spotted, and all the she goats that were speckled and spotted, and every one that had some white in it, and all the brown among the sheep, and gave them into the hand of his sons.
korean_text: 그 날에 그가 숫염소 중 얼룩무늬 있는 것과 점 있는 것을 가리고 암염소 중 흰 바탕에 아롱진 것과 점 있는 것을 가리고 양 중의 검은 것들을 가려 자기 아들들의 손에 맡기고

sentences.original_text: the he goats that were ringstraked and spotted
and all the she goats that were speckled and spotted
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 얼룩과 점이 있는 모든 암염소들을

sentences.original_text: and every one that had some white in it
and all the brown among the sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 양들 중의 갈색 것들을 모두

sentences.original_text: and gave them into the hand of his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 그의 아들들의 손에 주었습니다
